Thermomigration occurs along temperature gradient. Since direct measurement of the nanoscale temperature distribution is still a formidable challenge, we resort to an estimation of the temperature gradient based on the dynamic measurement of nanowire growth. Figure 2e–f show the nanowire in the uniform growth stage, with a nearly constant velocity of v = 3.8 nm s −1 (see Supplementary Fig. 6).
